segment.source: After you have a completed the steps covered in the other guides to prepare the device, the focus shifts to preparing the device for the final retail configuration.
segment.target: After you have a completed the steps covered in the other guides to prepare the device, the focus shifts to preparing the device for the final retail configuration.

segment.source: After you have a completed the steps covered in the other guides to prepare the device, the focus shifts to preparing the device for the final retail configuration.
segment.target: After you have a completed the steps covered in the other guides to prepare the device, the focus shifts to preparing the device for the final retail configuration.

segment.source: During this process, you set the final configuration values, remove debug logging, and optimize the OS for shipment.
segment.target: During this process, you set the final configuration values, remove debug logging, and optimize the OS for shipment.

segment.source: Next, you determine how the OS will be transferred to the device hardware in the manufacturing line.
segment.target: Next, you determine how the OS will be transferred to the device hardware in the manufacturing line.

segment.source: Here are some common acronyms that might come in handy.
segment.target: Here are some common acronyms that might come in handy.

segment.source: computer interactive testing—semi-automated testing of the device.
segment.target: computer interactive testing—semi-automated testing of the device.

segment.source: During this stage, the device is connected to a PC or workstation
segment.target: During this stage, the device is connected to a PC or workstation

segment.source: National Institute of Standards and Technology
segment.target: National Institute of Standards and Technology

segment.source: real-time clock—on-board hardware clock used to track the current time
segment.target: real-time clock—on-board hardware clock used to track the current time

segment.source: The goal for Windows 10 Mobile is that partners are successful in establishing efficient and effective processes that span manufacturing, testing, and servicing.
segment.target: The goal for Windows 10 Mobile is that partners are successful in establishing efficient and effective processes that span manufacturing, testing, and servicing.

segment.source: To that end, Microsoft will provide guidance on the tools and process that are used for manufacturing and support of a Windows 10 Mobile device.
segment.target: To that end, Microsoft will provide guidance on the tools and process that are used for manufacturing and support of a Windows 10 Mobile device.

segment.source: This guidance describes the tools and techniques that are available to OEMs during the manufacturing process.
segment.target: This guidance describes the tools and techniques that are available to OEMs during the manufacturing process.

segment.source: Example test area by manufacturing phase
segment.target: Example test area by manufacturing phase

segment.source: Using a host computer to reboot a phone to flashing mode and get version information
segment.target: Using a host computer to reboot a phone to flashing mode and get version information

segment.source: Final retail images must be configured to meet a set of security requirements.
segment.target: Final retail images must be configured to meet a set of security requirements.

segment.source: To help OEMs ensure that their retail images meet these requirements, Windows 10 Mobile automatically checks for some of these requirements during first boot.
segment.target: To help OEMs ensure that their retail images meet these requirements, Windows 10 Mobile automatically checks for some of these requirements during first boot.

segment.source: Other requirements must be verified by OEMs.
segment.target: Other requirements must be verified by OEMs.

segment.source: Getting ready to build and test Windows 10 for mobile editions?
segment.target: Getting ready to build and test Windows 10 for mobile editions?

segment.source: Here's a lab that walks through building new mobile devices and customizing them to meet your customers' needs.
segment.target: Here's a lab that walks through building new mobile devices and customizing them to meet your customers' needs.

segment.source: Manufacturing mode of the full operating system
segment.target: Manufacturing mode of the full operating system

segment.source: Manufacturing mode is a mode of the full operating system that can be used for manufacturing-related tasks, such as component and support testing.
segment.target: Manufacturing mode is a mode of the full operating system that can be used for manufacturing-related tasks, such as component and support testing.

segment.source: Microsoft Manufacturing OS (MMOS) is an optimized configuration of the operating system that facilitates efficient manufacturing.
segment.target: Microsoft Manufacturing OS (MMOS) is an optimized configuration of the operating system that facilitates efficient manufacturing.

segment.source: Deploy and test a user-mode test application in MMOS
segment.target: Deploy and test a user-mode test application in MMOS

segment.source: You can develop a custom flashing tool to address the life cycle needs of the device
segment.target: You can develop a custom flashing tool to address the life cycle needs of the device

segment.source: OEMs need to determine the manufacturing process to use to implement MMOS in their manufacturing facilities.
segment.target: OEMs need to determine the manufacturing process to use to implement MMOS in their manufacturing facilities.

segment.source: To discuss the manufacturing process, a simplified model of the manufacturing line workflow will be used.
segment.target: To discuss the manufacturing process, a simplified model of the manufacturing line workflow will be used.

segment.source: Note that each OEM will have a unique process; this simplified model is used as a common reference point.
segment.target: Note that each OEM will have a unique process; this simplified model is used as a common reference point.

segment.source: Board tests/SMT – Image is flashed via gang programmer.
segment.target: Board tests/SMT – Image is flashed via gang programmer.

segment.source: Final assembly, Boot – Marry board with plastic; the first time the device is booted on the manufacturing floor.
segment.target: Final assembly, Boot – Marry board with plastic; the first time the device is booted on the manufacturing floor.

segment.source: Manual tests – Line worker runs device tests such as sound, vibration, camera, keyboard, and so on.
segment.target: Manual tests – Line worker runs device tests such as sound, vibration, camera, keyboard, and so on.

segment.source: RF/Call testing – Automated testing in which the device is tethered to enable power and the recording of test data.
segment.target: RF/Call testing – Automated testing in which the device is tethered to enable power and the recording of test data.

segment.source: Final provisioning – Automated process where IMEI data is written, customizations are loaded, and labeling is completed.
segment.target: Final provisioning – Automated process where IMEI data is written, customizations are loaded, and labeling is completed.

segment.source: Final QA/Packaging – Final manual verification of the device, then packaging.
segment.target: Final QA/Packaging – Final manual verification of the device, then packaging.

segment.source: Random sample testing – A specified number of devices are removed from packaging and tested.
segment.target: Random sample testing – A specified number of devices are removed from packaging and tested.

segment.source: If failures reach a certain threshold, the entire line may be recalled.
segment.target: If failures reach a certain threshold, the entire line may be recalled.

segment.source: Each manufacturer has different techniques and tooling that they use to manufacture Windows 10 Mobile devices.
segment.target: Each manufacturer has different techniques and tooling that they use to manufacture Windows 10 Mobile devices.

segment.source: Two options are described here, but the OEM is encouraged to combine approaches and innovate as needed.
segment.target: Two options are described here, but the OEM is encouraged to combine approaches and innovate as needed.

segment.source: The best technical expertise regarding manufacturing resides with those who built the OEM manufacturing line.
segment.target: The best technical expertise regarding manufacturing resides with those who built the OEM manufacturing line.

segment.source: Select the guidance that works for your manufacturing processes and business.
segment.target: Select the guidance that works for your manufacturing processes and business.

segment.source: A summary of two example manufacturing processes is provided here.
segment.target: A summary of two example manufacturing processes is provided here.

segment.source: Manufacturing process option 1: boot from WIM MMOS image
segment.target: Manufacturing process option 1: boot from WIM MMOS image

segment.source: You can temporarily copy a WIM (Windows Imaging) Microsoft Manufacturing OS (MMOS) image over to a device and then boot to that image that is running in volatile RAM memory.
segment.target: You can temporarily copy a WIM (Windows Imaging) Microsoft Manufacturing OS (MMOS) image over to a device and then boot to that image that is running in volatile RAM memory.

segment.source: For more information about MMOS, see Microsoft Manufacturing OS.
segment.target: For more information about MMOS, see Microsoft Manufacturing OS.

segment.source: Because the test WIM MMOS image that will never ship is used on the device, this approach enables the provisioning of additional manufacturing tools (transports, extenders).
segment.target: Because the test WIM MMOS image that will never ship is used on the device, this approach enables the provisioning of additional manufacturing tools (transports, extenders).

segment.source: Also, OEMs can use any functional native APIs in the test image.
segment.target: Also, OEMs can use any functional native APIs in the test image.

segment.source: Additional factory test-only drivers or other software can be included in the WIM MMOS image.
segment.target: Additional factory test-only drivers or other software can be included in the WIM MMOS image.

segment.source: One advantage of using this approach is that booting from a WIM Image in RAM is faster than flashing the image.
segment.target: One advantage of using this approach is that booting from a WIM Image in RAM is faster than flashing the image.

segment.source: For more info, see Working with WIM MMOS images.
segment.target: For more info, see Working with WIM MMOS images.

segment.source: Manufacturing process option 2: reflash the device
segment.target: Manufacturing process option 2: reflash the device

segment.source: This process uses two images: one for factory testing, and a final golden image for the final shipping device.
segment.target: This process uses two images: one for factory testing, and a final golden image for the final shipping device.

segment.source: Like the MMOS WIM image, the test image that will never ship is used on the device.
segment.target: Like the MMOS WIM image, the test image that will never ship is used on the device.

segment.source: This mean that additional manufacturing tools (transports, extenders) can be included and manufacturing only native APIs can be called.
segment.target: This mean that additional manufacturing tools (transports, extenders) can be included and manufacturing only native APIs can be called.

segment.source: This approach makes it possible, if appropriate, to use a different version of the operating system for testing.
segment.target: This approach makes it possible, if appropriate, to use a different version of the operating system for testing.

segment.source: This may be a useful interim measure as test applications are being migrated to Windows 10 Mobile.
segment.target: This may be a useful interim measure as test applications are being migrated to Windows 10 Mobile.

segment.source: One tradeoff in this approach is that the manufacturing line must be designed to accommodate the reflashing time that occurs near the end of the manufacturing process.
segment.target: One tradeoff in this approach is that the manufacturing line must be designed to accommodate the reflashing time that occurs near the end of the manufacturing process.

segment.source: For more info on working with the flashing tools, see Flashing tools.
segment.target: For more info on working with the flashing tools, see Flashing tools.

segment.source: Example test area by manufacturing phase
segment.target: Example test area by manufacturing phase

segment.source: Test area by manufacturing phase is provided only as an example; each manufacturer may wish to sequence the tests differently.
segment.target: Test area by manufacturing phase is provided only as an example; each manufacturer may wish to sequence the tests differently.
